entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
